ruleContent.content:
cimg=[]; if(String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)){ b=String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1];} else{b=''} if(String(result).match(/"size":\s*"[^"]+",\s*"url":\s*"[^"]+"/g)){ a=String(result).match(/"size":\s*"[^"]+",\s*"url":\s*"[^"]+"/g); for (i=0;i\n' }}else{html=''} if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(result)){ $ = result.match(/"page_info":\s*(\{[\s\S]+?\}),\s+"bid/)[1]; $ = JSON.parse($); html = '\n' } if(!baseUrl.match(/ttarticle/)){ result = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(b).html()+'\n'+html+java.getString("@@class.h5-4con@html")}else{result=java.getString("@@class.f-art@html")} if(/暂无目录....../.test(chapter.title)){ result = book.intro } if(/是\d+条/.test(source.bookSourceComment) && !baseUrl.match(/ttarticle/) && /detail/.test(baseUrl)){ page = source.bookSourceComment.match(/是(\d+)条/)[1]; page = Math.ceil(page/20); mid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)$/)[1]; max_id="0"; comments=""; count = 0; for(j=1;j<=page;j++){ commentsurl = `https://m.weibo.cn/comments/hotflow?id=${mid}&mid=${mid}&max_id=${max_id}&max_id_type=0`; hh= java.ajax(commentsurl); if(/体验微博客户端/.test(hh)){ h={}; page = 2; }else{ h = JSON.parse(hh) } if(h.ok==1){ list=h.data.data; max_id = h.data.max_id; if(j==1){ total = Math.ceil(h.data.total_number/20); page= page<=total?page:total; } for(i=0;i
" } count += 1 comments +="\n--@"+list[i].user.screen_name+"@--\n"+list[i].text+details; }} } result + comments } ##

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=/"text": "(.*)",/.test(result)?String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1]:"暂无目录";
b=d.replace(/<.*?>/g,"").replace(/#.*?#/g,"");
c=baseUrl;
l=[];

if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
	if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]+)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({
		text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",
		href:c
		})
	for(i in list){
	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],
		href:list[i].match(/href=\\"([^"]+)\\"/)[1]
		})
	  }
	}
	}else{
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
		}
		l
</js>

<js>
//用于自动生成发现规则
b=false;
if(b){
let api="/app/lib/listv2?packageId=ihuaben&page=\{\{page\}\}&pageSize=20&sortType=clickcount_days_7&tagId=0&tokenId=NTAyNDUwNTA6MTYyNjcyMzYyMzpjMGU3ODlhNzQ3OTZmYmIy&keyword=";
let words=['都市言情','古代言情','玄幻言情','校园言情','穿越言情','灵异言情','短篇','二次元','灵异','都市','玄幻奇幻','历史军事','武侠仙侠','游戏竞技','科幻末世','明星同人','动漫同人','游戏同人','影视同人','小说同人'];
var s=[];
words.map(o=>{
var i={"title":o,"url":api+o}
s.push(i);
})
java.log(JSON.stringify(s))
}
java.getString("$.wordcount")
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

var su=source.key;
function fn(value){
if(/验证码/.test(value)){
	img = `${su}/styles/code.php`;
	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
       data=java.post(`${su}/s.php`,`searchkey=${java.get('key')}&code=${code}`,{}).body()
       return fn(data)
   }else{
    return value
   }
}
result = fn(result)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
标签屏蔽在 搜索 和 发现 屏蔽相关标签书籍
标签说明https://www.uaa.com/novel/tags
(可以 搜索地址 修改separator的值为你觉得输入方便的字符，默认为@@ )
搜索时可使用  关键词@@标签  来进行附加标签搜索。 前面为搜索的关键词 ，@@后面的是标签，多个标签之间用 逗号( ,， )隔开。
关键词留空可直接搜索标签

<js>
//分类 category
let categoryList = [
	{
		title: "都市激情",
		type: "都市激情"
	},
	{
		title: "校园春色",
		type: "校园春色"
	},
	{
		title: "乡村爱情",
		type: "乡村爱情"
	},
	{
		title: "系统异能",
		type: "系统异能"
	},
	{
		title: "家庭乱伦",
		type: "家庭乱伦"
	},
	{
		title: "穿越重生",
		type: "穿越重生"
	},
	{
		title: "经典武侠",
		type: "经典武侠"
	},
	{
		title: "同人改编",
		type: "同人改编"
	},
	{
		title: "科学幻想",
		type: "科学幻想"
	},
	{
		title: "东方玄幻",
		type: "东方玄幻"
	},
	{
		title: "娱乐明星",
		type: "娱乐明星"
	},
	{
		title: "历史架空",
		type: "历史架空"
	},
	{
		title: "西方魔幻",
		type: "西方魔幻"
	},
	{
		title: "贤者小说",
		type: "贤者小说"
	},
]
//状态 finished
let statusList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ""
	},
	{
		title: '已完结',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '连载中',
		type: 0
	}
]
//篇幅 space
let spaceList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ''
	},
	{
		title: '短篇',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '中篇',
		type: 2
	},
	{
		title: '长篇',
		type: 3
	}
]

let list = [];
formatUrl = (space, category, finished) => {
	return `/api/novel/app/novel/search?category=${category}&finished=${finished}&space=${space}&excludeTags={{getExcludeTags();}}&size=40&page={{page}}`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (spaceItem of spaceList) {
	pushItem(`篇幅（${spaceItem.title}）`, "", 1);
	for (categoryItem of categoryList) {
		statusList[0].title = categoryItem.title;
		for (statusItem of statusList) {
			pushItem(`${statusItem.title}`, formatUrl(spaceItem.type,categoryItem.type,statusItem.type), 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//账号注册
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	let password = result.get("密码");
	let checkCode = result.get("邮箱验证码");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}
//获取验证码
function getVerificationCode() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	if (loginName) {
		let body = `email=${loginName}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/sendCheckCode';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}

function searchExcludeTags() {
	let excludeTags = this.getExcludeTags();
	//java.log(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
	java.longToast(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
}

function resetExcludeTags() {
	let data = getData();
	data.ExcludeTags = [];
	setData(data);
	//java.log("标签屏蔽已重置");
	java.toast("标签屏蔽已重置");
}

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {
		data.ExcludeTags.push(tag);
	} else {
		data.ExcludeTags.splice(index, 1);
	}
	//java.log(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	java.toast(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	setData(data);
}
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var ua = "navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(); 			return { 				'mobile': !!(ua.match(/applewebkit.*mobile.*/) || ua.match(/iemobile/) || ua.match(/windows phone/) || ua.match(/android/) || ua.match(/iphone/) || ua.match(/ipad/)), 				'weixin': ua.indexOf('micromessenger') > -1 			};";
	var heders = {"User-Agent": ua};
	return JSON.stringify(heders);
})()
</js>

page=6
}else{page=page}

list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束


content=java.getString("$.content",false);
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody",false);
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){

result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json

//判定json里是否有items
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content

</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

				}

bookSourceComment:
缝合了部分来自 @冯KUYOU 的修改。

源变量填 1/0 可以 开/关 正文的随机图片显示，不填为显示。
关掉图片显示可提升正文加载速度。

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

bookSourceComment: 增加保存重定向后的域名到源变量，搜索时使用重定向后的域名进行搜索。 换源url时，先在右上角三个点 设置源变量里清空源变量再换源url。 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.6yydstxt226.com/ https://www.6yydstxt434.com/ https://www.6yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt234.com/ https://www.5yydstxt178.com/

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function parseComments(n){
  for(var c=[],e=0;e<n.length;e++){
    var o=n[e]; c.push("".concat(o.createrId.userName,"｜").concat(o.createdAt.slice(0,10),"\n评分：").concat("🌟".repeat(o.score),"\n评语：").concat(o.content.replace(/([\u4e00-\u9fa5])(?=\n|$)/,"$1……").replace(/([^。！？—…]{9}[。；！？—…]+”?)([\u4e00-\u9fa5][^。！？—…]{7})/g,"$1\n$2")))}
return c.join("\n————\n");}
var data = JSON.parse(result);
data=data.data.comments;
data.length == 0 ? '暂无评价！': parseComments(data);
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
if(pageCount>1){pageCount=2};
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
if(!cache.get("ua")){   	cache.put("ua",java.ajax("https://randua.somespecial.one/"),86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(re,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(src,baseUrl,null);
original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line

//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];

h
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
chapterPageBeat = java.get("chapterPageBeat");
chapterUrl = java.get("chapterUrl");
chapterName = java.get("chapterName");

sourceUrl1 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1];
java.log(sourceUrl1);
sourceUrl2 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\/[\/a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1]
java.log(sourceUrl2);

if(chapterPageBeat!=""){
f=new RegExp(chapterPageBeat,"i");
cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").match(f)[1];
}
else{cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").replace(/>\s+</g, "><");}

var chapterList = [];
name = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterName,"g"));
url = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterUrl,"g"));

for(var i = 0; i < name.length; i ++){
text = name[i].match(chapterName)[1];
uri = url[i].match(chapterUrl)[1];

if(uri.indexOf("/") == -1){
	 	href=sourceUrl2 +"/"+ uri;
	 	}else{href = sourceUrl1 + uri;}
	 	href = href +","+ JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":href}})
	 	
chapterList.push({
		 	  text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
 }

chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*
	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or7.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

/*
	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or7.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;

act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

'还没有人对这本书发表评价哦！

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.author: span.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("div.RegDiv form input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

@js:
url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "/sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

url = `${url},{"body": "${body}", "method": "POST"}`

    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("div.RegDiv form input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result

body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

url = `${url},{"body": "${body}", "method": "POST"}`

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
